*******************
Quick start guide.
*******************

This guide outlines a few actions that can be performed after completing the installation section.

1. **Start Django Development Server:**

Start the Django development server:

.. code-block::

    python manage.py runserver

2. **Access the Django Application:**

Open a web browser and go to http://127.0.0.1:8000/ to view your cloned Django project running locally.

3. **Acces to admin page:**

You can access the admin interface by navigating to this URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/

*The credentials are as follows:*

    - Username: admin
    - Password: Abc1234!

4. **Acces to lettings and profiles:**

You can access the list of lettings by navigating to this URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/lettings/

You can access the list of profiles by navigating to this URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/profiles/
